testcase.name: /seasons/{id} endpoint'ine gecerli authorization bilgileri ve id verisinin bulundugu
testcase.system-out: * Api kullanicisi "employee" token ile base urli olusturur..................passed * Api kullanicisi "seasons", 11 path parametrelerini olusturur..............passed * Api kullanicisi get request gonderir ve donen responsei kaydeder..........passed * Api kullanicisi status codeun 200 oldugunu dogrular.......................passed * Api kullanicisi seasons id endpointinden donen response bodynin schema validation dogrulamasini yapar.passed
